title: Elizabeth Marvel to play mother of Tom Austen and Sydney Lemmon in Marvel's demonic Helstrom series
text:
Elizabeth Marvel will portray the institutionalized mother of Tom Austen and Sydney Lemmon in the upcoming Marvel horror series Helstrom.

The 49-year-old actress will play Victoria Helstrom in the Hulu series while English actor Austen, 31, will portray her son Daimon Helstrom and Lemmon, 29, will play daughter Ana Helstrom.

The demonic live-action 10-episode series will debut in 2020 on Disney-owned Hulu, according to an article Tuesday by Deadline.

Marvel star: Elizabeth Marvel, shown in September 2018 in Canada, has been cast as Victoria Helstrom in the upcoming Marvel series Helstrom on Hulu

The series produced by Marvel Television and ABC Signature Studios will be based on Marvel comic book characters and will be Marvel's first move into the terror genre on television.

The series was summarized as follows by Marvel: 'Daimon and Ana Helstrom are the son and daughter of a mysterious and powerful serial killer. The siblings have a complicated dynamic as they track down the terrorizing worst of humanity — each with their attitude and skills.'

Paul Zbyszewski, 49, will serve as showrunner and will executive produce along with Marvel Television head Jeph Loeb, 61.

'We feel incredibly fortunate to have landed a cast loaded with this much talent,' Zbyszewski told Deadline.

Demonic role: Tom Austen, shown in June 2018 in London, will play Daimon Helstrom, known in Marvel comics as Son Of Satan, and Sydney Lemmon, shown in November 2018 in New York City, will portray his sister Ana

'From the beginning, we knew we'd need a group of actors who were multifaceted, who could play all the chords any great Marvel show promises to play, from dramatic thriller to comedy to action. It's going to be really fun to watch them work,' he added.

The comic book character Daimon Hellstrom was co-created by comic book writer Roy Thomas, 78, and the late comics writer Gary Friedrich, who died in August 2018 at age 75.

Hellstrom, also known as Son Of Satan, debuted in 1973 in an issue of Ghost Rider, also co-created by Thomas and Friedrich.

Comics legend: Roy Thomas, shown in March 2017 in New York City, co-created the character Daimon Hellstrom, also known as Son Of Satan and Hellstorm

The cast of Hellstrom also will include Robert Wisdom as Caretaker, June Carryl as Dr. Louise Hastings, Ariana Guerra as Gabriella Rosetti and Alain Uy as Chris Yen.

'Marvel Television is thrilled to have such an amazing cast that enriches Paul's fantastic writing,' Loeb said.

'The ensemble is the perfect way to bring our audience into our Adventure into Fear franchise causing delicious nightmares of what's to come!,' he added.
description: The 49-year-old actress will portray the institutionalized mother of Tom Austen and Sydney Lemmon in the upcoming Marvel horror series Helstrom.
